trans-unit.source: References the method to call when retrieving field data from a provider.
trans-unit.target: Hace referencia al método que se invoca cuando se recuperan datos de campos de un proveedor.

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts control provides data through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> interface, the consumer or transformer must retrieve and process the field data from the provider.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un control de elementos Web proporciona datos a través de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> interfaz, el consumidor o el transformador debe recuperar y procesar los datos del campo del proveedor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.FieldCallback> delegate represents the method to call for processing the provider data.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.FieldCallback> delegado representa el método al que llamar para procesar los datos del proveedor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField.GetFieldValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.FieldCallback> delegate parameter.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField.GetFieldValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.FieldCallback> parámetro de delegado.
